reqs: This problem-based learning course is designed to introduce graduate students to data processing, manipulation and analysis using a commonly available program (MATLAB and R). The examples used in the course come from research projects in hydrology and geomorphology, but the course is intended for all graduate students in the natural sciences who will be taking a quantitative, analytical approach to their research.
courseName: Topics in Geomorphology and Hydrology - TPCS GEMO & HYDR
